text: Huzur Vidhan Sabha Constituency is one of the 230 assembly constituencies of Madhya Pradesh. It comes under Bhopal district. In Huzur Vidhan Sabha all major parties including BJP and Congress will fight election face to face. The other parties that is BSP, samajwadi party and Aam Aadmi Party are also in the race. There are also some local political parties in the Huzur election 2018. Vidhan Sabha Huzur is the most difficult and important seat for the political parties to won. The main competition is in vidhan sabha Huzur seat as the headquarter Bhopal Seat. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== {| class="wikitable" style="width:80%;" |- ! style="background:#666; color:white;" colspan="2"|Year ! style="background:#666; color:white;"|Member ! style="background:#666; color:white;"|Political party |- |style="background- color: " | || 2008 || Jitendra Daga || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 2013 || Rameshwar Sharma || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 2018 | Rameshwar Sharma | Bharatiya Janata Party |- |} ==References== * * * Category:Assembly constituencies of Madhya Pradesh Category:Bhopal district
title: Huzur (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
